Posts.Content: Dec 2, 2017 06:06AM Debadoo wrote: hi all well I went to my core biopsy yesterday.... now the hard part waiting til Wednesday for results the procedure itself wasn’t bad at all... I don’t know what to make of it neither the tech or radiologist would say or give me any good/bad vibes/news although the tech said she thinks that it might be 2 lumps due to shaping/shadowing I watched the screen with hawk eyes but couldn’t make heads or tails of things I did see the needle going thru but rad had a hard time getting to the actual lump due to dense breast tissue took 5 samples said poss tues but most likely wed so now I have to try to keep busy til then.... continued prayers for all ^j^ ^j

Posts.Title: Birads4 need help Debadoo Debadoo

Posts.Content: Debadoo wrote: I am 46 yo had my first mammo 12/2016 told it was negative , within a week my doc called said I had "very dense" breast tissue requested ultrasound. Those results were as follows right breast 10oclock position 8cm from back is a curvilinear 7x5cm hypoechoic nodule with good acoustic no blood flow Birads cat 3 follow up 6m. Flash forward 6m just went for my ultrasound. Radiologist looked worried called doc in who reviewed my right breast then said "well it looks the same" but let's do a biopsy???? Referred me to breast care center who I seen today and the doc explained that US results showed an oval 9x5x4mm wider than taller 10oclock position 10cm back she quickly drew what I can only explain as sort of oval with tail irregular edges solid she said "oh dear you don't have to worry I'm 90-95% sure it's benign!!!! Don't worry really I have 2 paternal aunts both Dx at 45-50 of breast cancer. I'm scheduled for biopsy on Friday. My question I see the lump is small about the size of eraser head but it did get bigger albeit minuscule, anyone have similar results as mine and what did your biopsy results show!!! Should I be worried birads4 with family history Any input or help appreciated to ease my mind... I know waiting is the hardest part Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Birads4 need help Debadoo Debadoo
